name.description: Full-stack developer. Third year computer science student.

description.first: I am a passionate full-stack developer who is looking to hone his skills and develop intuitive, beautiful and most importantly secure applications. Currently I am studying in my third year at Klaipėdos valstybinė kolegija / Higher education institution.
description.second: I learned a lot during study years by doing multiple projects. I did not hold back to take on completely new things by myself or with my colleagues and I developed projects using Node, Express, Android Studio, Docker and so on.
description.third: Developed in an agile environment and I know basics of it and so the importance of communication, teamwork and taking the initiative to succesfully deliver a result.
description.fourth: In my leisure time I enjoy playing video games, fishing, watching videos on youtube and sometimes learning new things such as video editing, Blender, Unreal Engine or modding games in general.
